title: PHPlog10()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPlog10()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example Return the base-10 logarithm of different numbers: "); echo(log10(2) . "
"); echo(log10(1) . "
"); echo(log10(0)); ?> Definition and Usage The log10() function returns the base-10 logarithm of a number. Syntax log10( number ); Parameter Values Parameter Description number Required. Specifies the value to calculate the logarithm for Technical Details Return Value: The base-10 logarithm of number Return Type: Float PHP Version: 4+ ★ +1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPlog10()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPlog10()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPlog10()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
